scripts.all: echo 'Running all' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
scripts.pre-release: echo 'Running pre-release' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
scripts.publish-all: echo 'Running publish-all' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
scripts.examples:install: echo '[mock] examples:install' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
scripts.in: echo '[mock] in' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
scripts.changelog: echo '[mock] changelog' && echo 'Arguments:' && node -e "process.argv.slice(2).forEach((arg, i) => console.log('  ' + (i + 1) + '. ' + arg))"
